content.raw:
Sounds like it could be intermittent failures. I'll run it in a loop and see what happens.

I don't know why the jenkins console log does this, but it seems to lose some of the console output from qtests. It has the line number in the test results section that I linked though (which it gets from the junit xml file):

~~~
/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/undo.cc:907
 :: 'box->GetWorldPose() == boxFinalPose' returned FALSE. ()
~~~
content.html:
Sounds like it could be intermittent failures. I'll run it in a loop and see what happens.

I don't know why the jenkins console log does this, but it seems to lose some of the console output from qtests. It has the line number in the test results section that I linked though (which it gets from the junit xml file):

/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/undo.cc:907
 :: 'box->GetWorldPose() == boxFinalPose' returned FALSE. ()
